Name: Support Request Received
Subject: We have received your message
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thank you for contacting VirtualAddressHub. Your support request has been received.

We aim to respond as soon as possible. In the meantime, you may find our Help Centre helpful:
Visit help centre

If you have any questions, please reply to this email.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
TextBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thank you for contacting VirtualAddressHub. Your support request has been received.

We aim to respond as soon as possible. In the meantime, you may find our Help Centre helpful: {{help_centre_link}}

If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
